license.question: Do I need a financial license?
license.answer: No, we work through licensed acquirers like mono, LiqPay, Portmone, and Wayforpay. Money goes directly to your merchant account.

setup.question: How quickly can I get started?
setup.answer: Setup takes just 5 minutes. Create your account, add your payment processor, and start creating checkout links immediately.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are supported?
paymentMethods.answer: We support cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and cash-on-delivery. All major Ukrainian payment processors are integrated.

customization.question: Can I customize the checkout page?
customization.answer: Yes! Pro plans include white-label checkout with custom colors, your avatar, and your own subdomain for complete brand consistency.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At InstaPay, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. We also collect information about your use of our service automatically.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, send notifications, and ensure the security of our platform.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share information with our service providers who help us operate our services, and when required by law.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including SSL encryption and PCI DSS compliance for payment information.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to certain types of processing or request data portability.

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@instapay.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to InstaPay. By using our service, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using InstaPay, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, you may not use our service.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.content: InstaPay provides a platform for creating Instagram checkout links, enabling sellers to accept payments from customers through Stories and Direct Messages.

account.title: 3. User Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

payments.title: 4. Payments and Refunds
payments.content: Payments are processed through our acquirer partners. Refund policies are set by you as the seller for your customers. InstaPay is not responsible for transaction disputes.

prohibited.title: 5. Prohibited Use
prohibited.content: You agree not to use InstaPay for any illegal activities, fraud, or sale of prohibited items. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: InstaPay is provided 'as is'. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our service.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on this page.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@instapay.com
